resources.string: The official app of the Vilnius 700 anniversary movie
A movie created by all us, citizens, tourists, and lovers of our beautiful capital.
Upload moments, stories or memories while exploring at the same time what other people is doing.
Through the creation process you will be able to earn rewards for your contributors. Although the biggest reward will be to be selected by our renowned director John Doe
Once the movie is ready we will be premiering it as part of the Vilnius 700 anniversary celebrations in January 2023
